scripts.build:production: rimraf chrome/prod/src && webpack -p --config chrome/webpack.config.prod.js  && cd chrome/prod/ && bestzip ../../bot-wefinex.zip *
scripts.build:production-wefinex: rimraf wefinex-helper/prod/src && webpack -p --config wefinex-helper/webpack.config.prod.js && cd wefinex-helper/prod/ && bestzip ../../wefinex-helper.zip *
scripts.build:production-server: rimraf wefinex-server/prod/src && webpack -p --config wefinex-server/webpack.config.prod.js && cd wefinex-server/prod/ && bestzip ../../wefinex-server.zip *
